cause.description:
Alcohol is never the end of the world, but it is has comsumption dangers in amount as with any food. You can still be cool if you choose not to drink it and if you believe you should not drink it at all, as for putting certain other substances into the body.
It just seems almost everyone drinks alcohol, perhaps because of depression from the world and what others do in it, when it is originally not an idea of a norm. Many people support the scientific idea that alcohol should not be comsumed at all, as for smoking and drugs.
Cause Created July 2007
1. Alcohol is becoming more of a norm than ever.
2. People believe they are immoral or even sinful if they don't partake in the fellowship of drinking alcohol.
3. Alcohol is considered bad for the body scientifically and the idea of drinking it is indeed put down.
cause.mission: Promote the idea that you are still cool if you choose not to drink alcohol nor put other substances into your body.
cause.name: It's okay not to drink alcohol nor put certain other substances into your body.
